channel.title: Dragon Lord Set
channel.description:
Spent roughly 2 hours on this, just a random design i thought i'd make. Feel free to tell me where to improve or what you think. Cheers.
I didn't make a helmet or a weapon but if the mood strikes me i probably will. I was thinking either a tooth dagger or a staff, not sure about the helmet though.
[img]http://puu.sh/dX9h3/e617a38847.jpg[/img]
Update:
[img]http://puu.sh/dXLqz/1f7433a1a5.jpg[/img]
Datmaker:
[img]http://puu.sh/e5C7j/b6c6dde10a.jpg[/img]

Looks more like a corporal beast set than dragon to me. nevertheless 2 hours is amazing timing and I would like to see a follow up with a nice staff or tooth dagger.

item.title: Dragon Lord Set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Eyeownyew, post:5, topic:548882”]This takes you only two hours to make? the fudge…

what program do you use? I’m learning to use 3ds max and I love it but I can’t even imagine creating something like this[/quote]

Around that time, but i already had the design drawn up so i didn’t waste time trying to figure out what i wanted to do.

I use metasequoia because i’m comfortable with it, and i can get the most out of it.

poopler40:

good shit like always amy. can i see it in dat

Thanks, i updated a pic on the MT for you.

item.title: Dragon Lord Set
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:3, topic:548882”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=667790.msg4466018#msg4466018 date=1420186738]
I was worried you stopped making models since it was a while , And i’m glad this section isn’t fully dead.

So what i think is, The design is amazing is usual, and the colors fit together nicely expect the dark red doesn’t seem right somehow…
And the spikes on the back seem a bit too sharp on the top. Also the bottom is a bit too flat? If it’s a skirt then it’s supposed to be like that i guess, adding more curves would make it look ever better though.

But overall, 9.95/10
[/quote]
I’m sure it isn’t dead, just a little slow.

I had to use a colour to break up the bone and the grey, red seemed fitting. i’m not sure why it seems off, but oh well. The three point spikes give this impression because of the program but they don’t have hard lighting ingame, but i have tried to fix that. Not entirely sure what you mean about the bottom, but yes it is a robe and i’m not sure what you mean by curves or where to.

Also, i edited the model earlier today shortly after making the topic. i’ve updated the thread with a new picture, feel free to take a gander.[/quote]

Very fancy improvements

Now the skirt robe fits much more with that additional cape, And i like the nice crown and belt touch. Everything looks amazing,
I really have nothing to say that you can improve, You have mastered it. 10/10

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Lord Set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:2, topic:548882”]I was worried you stopped making models since it was a while , And i’m glad this section isn’t fully dead.

So what i think is, The design is amazing is usual, and the colors fit together nicely expect the dark red doesn’t seem right somehow…
And the spikes on the back seem a bit too sharp on the top. Also the bottom is a bit too flat? If it’s a skirt then it’s supposed to be like that i guess, adding more curves would make it look ever better though.

But overall, 9.95/10 :)[/quote]
I’m sure it isn’t dead, just a little slow.

I had to use a colour to break up the bone and the grey, red seemed fitting. i’m not sure why it seems off, but oh well. The three point spikes give this impression because of the program but they don’t have hard lighting ingame, but i have tried to fix that. Not entirely sure what you mean about the bottom, but yes it is a robe and i’m not sure what you mean by curves or where to.

Also, i edited the model earlier today shortly after making the topic. i’ve updated the thread with a new picture, feel free to take a gander.

Read full topic

So what i think is, The design is amazing is usual, and the colors fit together nicely expect the dark red doesn’t seem right somehow…

But overall, 9.95/10
